amendment.description: To modify the provision requiring a report on potential foreign military sales of the F-22A fighter aircraft to have the report developed by a federally funded research and development center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1796 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1796 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S8025-8029) To modify the provision requiring a report on potential foreign military sales of the F-22A fighter aircraft to have the report developed by a federally funded research and development center.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1796 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Chambliss.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1796 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
